comment._content: I think it is "Shimla" if it is the same tourist spot in india. Aw thnx to sharing all these pics.

comment.author: 16774434@N07
comment._content: The Bliss chemist shop was one of a small chain founded in Bengal by Tom Bliss an Anglo/Scottish pharmacist from Loganbuchanie, Morayshire.

comment.author: 23268776@N03
comment._content: Wow, fantastic shot. Taken just at the infamous Scandal Point in Simla. I have linked this photo to a couple of my shots of similar English suburban-style shops as they are today. Thx for sharing.
